step: Choose a steak to grill.
Find a rub recipe from a cookbook or online.
Make the rub.
Apply the rub to the steak.
Let the steak rest.
Grill the steak.
Finished.
task: How to Apply a Steak Rub
steps:
```lisp
(:action choose_chuck_steak
  :parameters (?p - player ?s - steak)
  :precondition (and (available ?s) (not (chosen ?s)))
  :effect (and (chosen ?s) (not (available ?s)))
)
(:action choose
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item)
  :precondition (and (available ?item) (not (chosen ?item)) (available ?agent))
  :effect (and (chosen ?item) (not (available ?item)))
)
(:action submerge
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - item ?medium - substance)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?actor ?entity) (inventory ?actor ?medium) (not (submerged ?entity)))
  :effect (and (submerged ?entity) (modified ?entity))
)
(:action brush
  :parameters (?item - object ?src - location ?dest - location ?attr_before - attribute ?attr_after - attribute)
  :precondition (and (location ?item ?src) (attribute ?item ?attr_before))
  :effect (and (location ?item ?dest) (attribute ?item ?attr_after) 
               (not (location ?item ?src)))
)
```

step: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Mix to combine thoroughly.
Sprinkle the rub across the steak.
Cook the steak as usual.

nl_step:
**Task**: How to Apply a Steak Rub  
**Steps in Natural Language**:
1. Select a chuck steak from the available options.
2. Choose the steak rub you want to apply.
3. Submerge the chuck steak in the steak rub to ensure it's fully coated.
4. Brush the steak to evenly distribute the rub across all surfaces.

step: Mix the dry ingredients.
Add the butter.
Add the milk.
Prepare to steam.
Cook the spotted dick.
Serve.
steps:
```lisp
(:action choose
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item)
  :precondition (and (available ?item) (not (chosen ?item)) (available ?agent))
  :effect (and (chosen ?item) (not (available ?item)))
)

(:action prepare_and_cook
  :parameters (?p - player ?i - ingredient ?l1 - location ?l2 - stove)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?i) 
    (at ?p ?l1) 
    (power ?l2 on) 
    (temperature ?l2 hot)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (cooked ?i) 
    (temperature ?i hot) 
    (location ?i ?l2) 
    (not (available ?i))
  )
)

(:action make
  :parameters (?npc - npc ?resource - entity ?location - location)
  :precondition (and
    (available ?npc)
    (at ?npc ?location)
    (not (prepared ?resource))
    (available ?resource)
  )
  :effect (and
    (prepared ?resource)
    (used ?resource)
    (not (available ?resource))
  )
)
```
